original: Milindapañha
Opammakathāpañha
Upacikāvagga
7. Migaṅgapañha
“Bhante nāgasena, ‘migassa tīṇi aṅgāni gahetabbānī’ti yaṁ vadesi, katamāni tāni tīṇi aṅgāni gahetabbānī”ti?
